metadata.title: CVE-2022-39324 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Grafana is an open-source platform for monitoring and observability. Priorto versions 8.5.16 and 9.2.8, malicious user can create a snapshot andarbitrarily choose the `originalUrl` parameter by editing the query, thanksto a web proxy. When another user opens the URL of the snapshot, they willbe presented with the regular web interface delivered by the trustedGrafana server. The `Open original dashboard` button no longer points tothe to the real original dashboard but to the attackerâ€™s injected URL. Thisissue is fixed in versions 8.5.16 and 9.2.8.

criterions.comment: grafana package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
